Description:
Home Sweet Home
Located in ever popular Brimbank Gardens and close to all amenities and freeway is this cozy family home. Offering 3 good sized bedrooms, master with walk in robe and ensuite. Enter the hub of the home and experience the open plan kitchen, adjoining meals and family area. Other features include ducted heating, stainless steel appliances including dishwasher. Inspect today to avoid disappointment.

Description:
PERFECTLY PRESENTED WITH HUGE LAND
Stylish and sophisticated living meets family harmony with this superb Derrimut residence that really delivers in design through multiple living and entertainment areas of enormous proportions that encompass the alfresco area allowing a massive indoor/outdoor zone to be easily created by opening up the 2 sets of sliding doors from the dining and rumpus room. Beautifully presented and maintained the home comprises 4 spacious bedrooms, master with WIR and ensuite, 3 additional bedrooms with BIRs serviced by a lovely central bathroom, an open plan kitchen overlooking the dining and possible 3rd living space and massive adjacent rumpus area. Moving outside you will be brought back to the good old days of enjoying the freedom of an enormous rear yard and with the added bonus of easy access through the rear roller door of the double remote garage this property is perfectly suited to those that require ample secure off street parking for cars, caravans or boats, tradespeople who can build a large shed out the back or simply just use this huge space as somewhere for the kids to play. Other features include separate lounge at the front of the property, ducted heating, reverse cycle air conditioning, alarm, modern contemporary flooring, down lights, landscaped front and rear gardens and literally a few steps from amenities including schools, public transport, parkland, community centre, ABC learning centre and proposed new shops. A home to fill with precious everlasting memories awaits one lucky family.
Insights: 18 Scotney Crescent, DERRIMUT VIC 3030 was last sold in 2019.

Description:
YOUR SEARCH STOPS HERE!
The heading says it all. Combining cutting-edge design and high quality fittings, this large 41.5sq (approx) home will take your breath away. Set in an established pocket, this absolute gem is awaiting the homeowner who wants it all. Showcasing impeccable workmanship alongside modern family luxury living in one of Derrimut's finest locations. The interior is instantly eye-catching with its wide entrance flowing throughout the ground level. Going past the study and formal lounge to the gourmet kitchen highlights the home's luxury and detail with granite bench tops, ample storage, stainless steel appliances including a 900mm gas cooker, and a walk-in pantry
Enjoy your favourite movies in your own Theatre room, or entertain family and friends outside with the large alfresco area via family room.
Upstairs comprises of 4 massive bedrooms, master with en-suite and WIR, 2nd bedroom has its own private balcony and WIR and others with BIR's and a retreat room which is ideal for children to play. Features include, ducted heating, spa, alarm, water tank, internal access from the double garage, low maintenance front and rear gardens.
Ideally located in the heart of Derrimut within close proximity to parks, schools, transport, freeway and a choice of shopping precincts. Nothing could be finer.
Disclaimer: Every precaution has been taken to establish the accuracy of the above information but it does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU & STEVE JUSUP!!!
The perfect blend of indoor/outdoor living presents itself with this magnificent Metricon residence. Behind the appealing facade lies a perfectly presented, meticulously maintained home that provides size and space to accommodate the largest of families with the added bonus of a sensational decked outdoor living zone that will make you the envy of all your family and friends when entertaining. Comprising 4 spacious bedrooms with BIR, the spacious master offers a WIR and oversize shower ensuite with spa, open plan kitchen, dining, living area with floor to ceiling windows providing great views of the outside. Other features include separate lounge, open study or rumpus, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, split system in master bedroom, CCTV security, soaring high ceilings, a mixture of tiles and floorboards throughout the living zone, glass splashback and stainless steel appliances in kitchen, 1.5KW solar panel system, large backyard with pergola, storage shed ,landscaped low maintenance gardens and double remote garage with internal access. All this on a huge allotment of approximately 651sqm in an enviable location walking distance to all amenities including Derrimut Village and Deer Park train station.
Insights: 9 Glamis Court, DERRIMUT VIC 3030 was last sold in 2015.

Description:
QUALITY METRICON HOME
Only through inspection will you truly appreciate the effort and love that has gone into this fantastic Metricon built residence. An absolute credit to its current owners this home exudes warmth and comprises 3 very large bedrooms with BIRs with the luxurious master highlighted by a massive WIR and amazing ensuite featuring double vanities and full length shower. The sensational kitchen with stone benches , dishwasher and stainless steel appliances overlooks the expansive dining and main living area that leads out to a fantastic rear yard with huge decked area where many a celebration can be had or just enjoy a quiet drink in the serenity of your own little slice of paradise.Other features include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, alarm, bamboo timber flooring, upgraded window furnishings including plantation shutters, down lights, side access to rear by adding an additional crossover , landscaped low maintenance gardens and double remote garage with internal access. A special property for one lucky purchaser.
Insights: 7 Sudley Road, DERRIMUT VIC 3030 was last sold in 2015.

Description:
UNDER OFFER - OFFERS CLOSE TUES 28TH AT 5PM
This property's cutting edge facade will immediately impress but it is upon entering that you will truly appreciate what this immaculate residence offers with its gorgeous flooring and high ceilings and doors being just a taste of what is to come. The sensational kitchen featuring dual ovens, stone benches and WIP overlooks the dining and main living area and by opening the 3 sets of sliding doors in this area creates a huge indoor/ outdoor entertaining zone incorporating the magnificent alfresco and rear yard with the inside. Sleeping quarters comprise luxurious master bedroom with mirrored WIR and sensational twin vanity, double shower ensuite and 2 additional bedrooms with BIRs serviced by another high quality bathroom. A large separate study that can be easily converted to a 4th bedroom, formal lounge / rumpus room and double remote garage with internal access and room for a rear roller door for access to the rear complete the home. Other features include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, second crossover for additional off street parking, alarm, security cameras, quality window furnishings, downlights and landscaped front and rear gardens with extensive decking. A life of luxury enjoying the sanctuary of a home that offers everything awaits one lucky purchaser.

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU!!!
Exquisite quality coupled with a prized location combine to present you with the ultimate in luxury living and convenience. Polished Tasmanian Oak hardwood flooring throughout, stunning Caesar stone benchtop kitchen with 900mm appliances, glass splashback and walk in pantry and amazing outside spaces are just a taste of what this magnificent residence offers. The unique floorplan features 3 sizeable bedrooms and 2 living spaces and provides great flexibility in that various rooms can be used as either bedrooms or living areas easily accommodating all buyers particular requirements. Other features include 2 superb bathrooms, high ceilings, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, video intercom, plantation shutters, outside decking, landscaped front and rear gardens, storage shed, exposed aggregate concreting, double remote garage with internal access and literally only a couple of steps from the Derrimut Village and Deer Park train station. A lifestyle like no other awaits.
Insights: 234 Foleys Road, DERRIMUT VIC 3030 was last sold in 2015.

Description:
OPEN CANCELLED - CONTACT AGENT
Stockdale Leggo Real Estate in conjunction with Aussie Dragon Real Estate present 67 Sherrington Grange Derrimut. Positioned on just under 600sqm of land this 4 bedroom home presents an affordable opportunity for buyers that require size and space. The huge modern kitchen overlooks the dining and living area and flows out to the huge backyard space making this home perfect for the family buyer as the kids will have heaps of space to run around or for those that like to host parties who could transform this huge backyard into an amazing outside entertainment zone. Sleeping quarters comprise master with ensuite and WIR, and 3 extra oversized additional bedrooms with BIR serviced by a central bathroom. Investors should also look at this property closely as the 4 bedrooms will ensure great returns while the huge land will obviously appreciate greatly over time. Other features include ducted heating, split system cooling, dishwasher, alarm and double garage and possible side access for a trailor , boat or caravan.
Insights: 67 Sherrington Grange, DERRIMUT VIC 3030 was last sold in 2015.
